Children and Privacy on Code.gov

We believe in the importance of protecting the privacy of children online. The Childrenâ€™s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) governs information gathered online from or about children under the age of 13. This site is not intended to solicit or collect information of any kind from children under age 13. If you believe that we have received information from a child under age 13, please contact us at code@gsa.gov.
